title: Fragment of Check Pattern
description:
Textile. Ochre and orange wools. Ancient mend in black wool. Double sided tabby weave. Check pattern on one side. Orange ground with ochre spots on reverse.
Condition:  Very dry and brittle. Losing dessicated fibers.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
